entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Watson Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 11:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -34.0°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
